title: Bug 21706BidiUtil in win32 has Class.forName() usage
description: Bug 21706BidiUtil in win32 has Class.forName() usage.
OB: The BidiUtil class in the win32 implementation is using the Class.forName() method.
EB: The BidiUtil class in the win32 implementation should not use the Class.forName() method.
SR: To fix the issue, change the line 'static Callback callback = new Callback (new BidiUtil().getClass(), 'windowProc', 4);' to 'static Callback callback = new Callback(BidiUtil.class, 'windowProc', 4);'. This change should ensure the same functionality without using the Class.forName() method.
